property.name: Attr1
property.value: You may discard a card to add 1d6 ([ ] +1)([ ] +2) and the Poison or Fire trait to a combat check made at your location; If the discarded card has the Alchemical trait, add an additional 1d6. When you would banish a card with the Alchemical or Liquid trait or a spell without the Attack trait for its power, you may attempt a check to acquire it, replacing the required skill with your Craft skill; if you succeed, recharge it.
